text: Eleng kahoo Re u romeletseng ho sechaba, seo pele ho sona ho bileng teng lichaba tse seng li fetile, hore u tle u ba phetele seo Re u senoletseng sona, le hoja ba ntse ba latola Allah. E re: “Ke Mong`a ka; ha ho `Mopi e mong ntle ho Eena. Ke behile ts’epo ea ka ho Eena, ke tla boela ho Eena.”
